r.d: SQLite3 is a PHP extension for use with the SQLite database system. This extension bundles SQLite 3.5.6 though the minimum requirement is 3.3.9.
r.n: - Upgraded bundled SQLite to 3.5.6 - Added Fulltext Searching by default - Fixed crash when a prepared statement failed - Fixed overflow with 64bit numbers - Fixed building with thread safety enabled
